definition: variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: During a chat, Zheng said that he once worked as an electrician.
sentences.chinese: 在闲谈中，郑某提到了他曾是一名电工。

sentences.english: Donna call on her friend kith for a chat.
sentences.chinese: 多娜到她的朋友莉塔家闲谈。

sentences.english: We would see them confab in that room.
sentences.chinese: 我们常看到他们在那房间里闲谈。

sentences.english: On a brightly-shining Saturday afternoon, two old friends just stay at the balcony, chattering and reminiscing .
sentences.chinese: 一个阳光灿烂的周末下午，两个老朋友闲谈旧话。

sentences.english: Among the natter there are these sentences of wisdom .
sentences.chinese: 闲谈中夹有充满智慧的语句。

sentences.english: Well Deon, one of the hardest and scariest things to do in life is to make small talk with total strangers.
sentences.chinese: 迪恩，人生最困难最恐怖的一件事就是跟陌生人闲谈。

sentences.english: The manager let us cut the cackle.

sentences.chinese: 马丁在闲谈中泄露了自己的秘密。

sentences.english: They had a chat over a cup of tea.
They won't waste it listening to the interviewees' twaddle.
sentences.chinese: 他们不会把时间浪费在应聘人的闲谈上。

sentences.english: The American Psychological Association published a study about the "boomerang effect of gossip."
sentences.chinese: 美国心理协会发布了一个关于“闲谈的飞反效应”。

sentences.english: James likes chatting with his classmates during  recess.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆士喜欢在休息的时候与同学闲谈。

sentences.english: As palmers' chat makes short their pilgrimage.
sentences.chinese: 正如朝圣者闲谈，使漫漫长途缩短。

sentences.english: I love to schmooze on the phone with my friends.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢跟朋友在电话上闲谈。

sentences.english: The result is far different from a printed book, or even a chat around a table.
sentences.chinese: 网络结出的硕果远殊于印刷书籍或餐桌闲谈。

sentences.english: In the fall of 1943 false and malicious gossip was circulating.
sentences.chinese: 在一九四三年秋季，流传著一种捏造和恶意的闲谈。

definition: to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
casual conversation/chat/gossip/to talk about (whatever comes to mind)
object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
to exchange conventional greetings/to exchange pleasantries
to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
